SELECT OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_MM_ITEM_ID , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME as MS_VESSEL_ITEM_NAME, OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME as MS_LO_NAME, OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.COUNT , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER ,OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID
FROM OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_MM_ITEM ON OD_MM_ITEM.OD_MM_ITEM_ID = OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_MM_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL_ITEM ON MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_LO_ID
WHERE OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM ( OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_MM_ITEM_ID , SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_LO_ID , COUNT , MS_TANI_ID , BIKOU , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER ,OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( :OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , :OD_MM_ITEM_ID , :SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , :MS_LO_ID , :COUNT , :MS_TANI_ID , :BIKOU , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :SHOW_ORDER ,:OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID )

UPDATE OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM SET OD_MM_ITEM_ID = :OD_MM_ITEM_ID , SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME = :SHOUSAI_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID , COUNT = :COUNT , MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID , BIKOU = :BIKOU , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER ,OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID = :OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID
WHERE OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID = :OD_MM_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID
